name: vibratory
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
shaking slightly and quickly, or causing something to shake slightly and quickly: There was a curious vibratory motion of the table. Sound is vibratory.
More examplesFewer examplesThe male bird then descends with a peculiar vibratory motion of the wings.The solar system generates a matrix of light, sound, and vibratory energies.Pollination is aided by the vibratory action of wind and by visiting insects.A similar approach could account for the vibratory behaviour of springs.
